about.title: About
about.text: Software Engineer with the objective of applying methods and technologies to real projects. I have professional experience in process automation and software development with Angular and Java. I have developed academic projects that allow me to apply my skills in real-world situations such as the projects below.

reactJava.title: React Java Project
reactJava.description: Hello! This is my initial project, developed in React with a Java backend. The project is containerized with Docker, making it easy to handle, and I plan to host it in the cloud soon. If you want to learn more, click on the link below.
reactJava.name: GitHub

portifolioAngular.title: Angular Portfolio
portifolioAngular.description: This is my portfolio, which is constantly being improved and receiving updates. It was developed in Angular, one of the frameworks I am familiar with. If you want to learn more, click on the link below.
portifolioAngular.name: GitHub

toDoList.title: Task List
toDoList.description: This is my project for a simple task list, using browser LocalStorage and communication between components. For this project, I only used Angular in its development. If you want to check it out and use it, just click on the link below.
toDoList.name: Go to website
